Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Fuel nozzle blockage. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Compressor Section component.
Inspection revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 19/01/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer
